atom:content.xhtml:div:
yulup-0.2.1-r22222.xpi (January 26, 2007)
Changelog:
Fixed WYSIWYG XSLT mode view to not trying to back-propagate spurious elements.
Implemented canvasbuttons and replaced widget toobarbuttons by them.
Fixed saving to local filesystem. Platform Windows can now save to the local file system as well.
Fixed bug which prevented the Exit button from working under certain conditions.
Fixed loading of documents contained in NAR archives.
Several under-the-hood changes.
